title: What is your favorite skin?
body:
Its pretty simple... what is your favorite skin?

i used to love kingpin twitch, but they ruined it with the splash updates :(

I recently became a Kennen player and discovered I had unlocked a skin for him ages ago.... turns out it is kinda rare too, which is cool but I really like the skin and the splash update, i think was definitely an improvement.

http://i.ebayimg.com/00/s/NjAwWDYwMA==/z/LrAAAOSwBLlU2mUr/$_1.JPG
(lol it is a mouse pad.... get it?)

also if you have rare skins you like, feel free to share  :)
